text: e Work and production: engine installed, customer served, order finished. e You can also identify candidates using the following checklist of general event types: e Transportation: shipment received, article sent, car delivered. e Consumption: item purchased, budget updated, item rejected. e Life cycle: person created, person rejected, conference finished. e Career and education: graduated, job offered, resigned, enrolled in a class. e Contracting and exchange: reservation made, schedule agreed, call received, transaction made. e Monitoring and control: vehicle dispatched, temperature exceeded, pump started. e Planning and management: person employed, materials allocated, article placed in program, schedule agreed. e Decision making and communication: article reviewed, article chosen.
